actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1505.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 1 to require candidates for Federal office, Members of the Congress, and officers and employees of the United States to file statements with the Comptroller General with respect to their income and financial transactions.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1 (financial disclosure).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 1 to require candidates for Federal office, Members of the Congress, and officers and employees of the United States to file statements with the Comptroller General with respect to their income and financial transactions.
